channel.title: Netgear
channel.description:
Ok, well, I figured out to port forward, but now unto the problem. I forget my NetGear username, and password, and I tried the default for it, and I can't remember. So, is there anyway to reset the password, and username?
If there's not, then how about a way to run a server that people get on using a wireless router? For instance, is there anyway to run a server whilst using a wireless router, and NOT having to get into my NetGear?

item.title: Netgear
item.dc:creator: @darkandlightjak5 darkandlightjak5
item.description:
@darkandlightjak5 wrote:

[quote=“Haxor X, post:8, topic:110977”]…most likely the button would be somewhere near the place you type your password…
like this…

username:
password:
            [sub][u]forgot password?[/u][/sub]

and why not go down stairs to use so you won’t have to go through this trouble?[/quote]

Well haxor thanks for trying to help me out, and by the way, it’s not the default anymore, I remember I changed it, plus for the fact that I already tried that, the username as Admin, and the password as password.

Read full topic
